    {

        public string cName { get; set; }

    public class tCoach
    {
        public string fUserId { get; set; }
        public int cId { get; set; }
        public string cName { get; set; }
        public string cGender { get; set; }
        public string cStar { get; set; }
        public string cInterest { get; set; }
        public string cItem { get; set; }
        public string cYears { get; set; }
        public string cLineid { get; set; }
        public string cPhone { get; set; }
        public string cEmail { get; set; }
        public string cImg { get; set; }
        public List<SelectListItem> cStarOptions { get; set; }

        public tCoach()
        {
            // 初始化星座选项列表
            cStarOptions = new List<SelectListItem>
        {
            new SelectListItem { Text = "白羊座", Value = "白羊座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "金牛座", Value = "金牛座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "雙子座", Value = "雙子座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "巨蟹座", Value = "巨蟹座" },

            new SelectListItem { Text = "處女座", Value = "處女座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "天秤座", Value = "天秤座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "天蠍座", Value = "天蠍座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "射手座", Value = "射手座" },
            new SelectListItem { Text = "摩羯座", Value = "摩羯座" },

            new SelectListItem { Text = "雙魚座", Value = "雙魚座" }

        };

    }

    public class tOrderDetail
    {
        public int fId { get; set; }
        public string fOrderGuid { get; set; }
        public string fUserId { get; set; }
        public string fPId { get; set; }
        public string fName { get; set; }
        public int fPrice { get; set; }
        public int fQty { get; set; }
        public string fIsApproved { get; set; }
    }

    public class tOrder
    {
        public int fId { get; set; }
        public string fOrderGuid { get; set; }
        public string fUserId { get; set; }
        public string fReceiver { get; set; }
        public string fEmail { get; set; }
        public string fAddress { get; set; }
        public Nullable<System.DateTime> fDate { get; set; }
        public string fTrancsationId { get; set; }
        public string fPaid { get; set; }
    }

    public class tMember
    {
        public int fId { get; set; }
        public string fUserId { get; set; }
        public string fPwd { get; set; }
        public string fName { get; set; }
        public string fEmail { get; set; }
        public System.DateTime fBirthday { get; set; }
        public string fClass { get; set; }
        public string VerificationCode { get; set; }
        public bool IsVerified { get; set; }
    }
